description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Yogyakarta, Indonesia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Heritage Escape in the Heart of Yogyakarta near Malioboro with Spa & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Indulge in timeless elegance and immerse yourself in cultural treasures at a majestic five-star heritage retreat in central Yogyakarta, Indonesia’s cultural heart. Blending graceful Javanese design with European sophistication, this charming stay offers a rich sensory experience - from tranquil afternoons by the colonial-style pool to exquisite dining in the open-air courtyard of Paprika, where local and international cuisines come alive. Step outside and embrace Yogyakarta’s vibrant soul. Just moments from the lively Malioboro Street, the hotel is your gateway to iconic sites like the Kraton Palace and the ancient wonders of Prambanan and Borobudur. End your day at Vino Bar, sipping a handcrafted cocktail as the city’s cultural rhythm hums softly in the background.

hotels.vendor_name: Novotel Yogyakarta International Airport Kulon Progo
hotels.title: Stylish Yogyakarta Airport Stay with Onsite Spa & Pool
hotels.description: Just minutes from Yogyakarta Airport, on the Indonesian island of Java, this sophisticated hotel is the pinnacle of convenient comfort. Everything you need is at your fingertips: unwind in the outdoor pool, keep up with your routine in the fitness centre and savour international flavours at Food Exchange. When the sun sets, sip on cocktails at the rooftop bar overlooking the Menoreh Hills. While this chic retreat is near the airport, it’s also just an hour's drive from the rich cultural treasures of Yogyakarta. Discover the Prambanan Temple Compounds, a UNESCO World Heritage Site showcasing 10th-century Hindu architecture, or immerse yourself in the bustling atmosphere of Malioboro Street for markets and trendy boutiques.

hotels.title: Contemporary Indonesia Novotel Retreat with Traditional Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Rising above the heart of Yogyakarta, this hotel exemplifies Indonesian hospitality with its stylishly appointed rooms and bustling social spaces. Relax in the rooftop infinity pool overlooking the sprawling cityscape, stay active at the on-site fitness centre, or savour Indonesian flavours at the signature Food Exchange restaurant. Step outside and find the legendary Malioboro Street's food markets serving up local gudeg (jackfruit stew) and sate ayam (chicken satay). The majestic Kraton Royal Palace and the historic Yogyakarta Monument are both within a 20-minute stroll, while the ancient temple of Borobudur, the largest Buddhist temple in the world, is an easy 45-minute drive.

hotels.title: Contemporary East Yogyakarta Hotel with Spa & Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Combining rich Javanese tradition with French detailing, this elegant hotel is your ideal base for discovering greater Yogyakarta. Explore the nearby historic Sultan's Palace, or venture further afield to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Borobudur Temple for true cultural immersion. Back at the hotel, savour local cuisine at Purple, boasting floor-to-ceiling windows and warm decor, or sip on cocktails at the stylish 80’8 Bar, offering panoramic city views. For complete relaxation, unwind by the outdoor pool or head straight to the spa for rejuvenating treatments.

hotels.title: Serene Javan Hotel in Yogyakarta with Golf Course, Multi-Tiered Pool & Three Onsite Eateries
hotels.description: Experience the cultural heart of Java at Hyatt Regency Yogyakarta, nestled within 22 hectares of tranquil tropical gardens on the outskirts of northwestern Yogyakarta. This serene retreat features a nine-hole golf course, night driving range and a sprawling, multi-tiered pool with a waterslide. Enjoy diverse dining experiences, from open-kitchen delights at Kemangi Bistro to fresh juices and cocktails at Bogey’s Teras, or local street food at Angkringan at Hyatt. Venture beyond the hotel to discover the ancient wonders of Borobudur and Prambanan, hunt for unique local crafts, or surrender to pure relaxation with a rejuvenating treatment at the luxurious spa.
